title: Insanesville ////// 268
description:
Insanesville ////// 268

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Zanesville, Ohio - October 18th, 2011 - a call came into 911 that set the whole town on edge. There was a lion on the loose. Police arrived on scene to find many large and dangerous animals roaming free. They also found the lifeless body of a 62 year old man. What went down on that autumn day can only be described as insane. Beer of the Week - Zookeeper by Empyrean Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5
